oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mt. Zion MB Decaturville: church
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color photograph of Mt. Zion Missionary Baptist Church. The large, gable-fronted building is constructed of concrete blocks. A shed roof portico shelters the double doors on the facade. A smalls sign, located above the portico, reads "Mt. Zion Missionary Baptist Church."
Mt. Zion Missionary Baptist Church is rural African American church in Decaturville, Tennessee. The current building was constructed in 1950.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee; Baptist church buildings
